attributes.action: Change the way education health and care plans are issued.
attributes.additional_details: The process should take 20 weeks which is too long. You could easily get everyone in the room for 4-5 hours and create the plan together. I have since been led to believe that they hold information back from the parents. Every child has different strengths and abilities so why do the councils follow a standard chart? My child is just as important as everyone else and it’s in his best interest he has the right surroundings. Do not be bullied into the wrong choices for your child. They all matter.
attributes.background: Education health and care plans are what is needed to get your child into the right provision. How can parents be told that Severe learning difficulty (SLD) is the right provision then to be told mainstream is the only option?

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We understand that you'd like changes to be made to Education, Health and Care Plans, but we're not sure exactly what changes you'd like. In particular, we're not sure whether you're concerned about how the plans are drawn up, how they are interpreted or something else. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
